ingredients.name: vanilla (they're sugar cookies so try to use clear if you have it)

steps.description: Cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
Add eggs, one at a time. Beat until it's mixed in fully.
Mix together flour, salt, and baking powder. Add them in, slowly, to the wet mixture.
Refrigerate dough wrapped in plastic wrap for 1 hour.

Preheat oven to 375 degrees fahrenheit. Roll out dough onto floured surface with floured rolling pin. Cut into trefoil shapes, or just 2"-3" circles. I bent a football cutter into the best trefoil I could make, because seriously, I do not need a football cookie cutter.
Bake on a silpat or parchment paper-lined baking sheet for 8-10 minutes (if _really_ thin, 6-7 minutes), or until golden around the edges.
